thread.title: Letter slamming Safe Schools program sparks outrage | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Letter slamming Safe Schools program sparks outrage | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephen Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
title: Letter slamming Safe Schools program sparks outrage | Daily Mail Online
text: 'Gender identity disorder is a mental illness': The fiery letter slamming 'harmful' Australia's Safe Schools program dividing parents on the internet Letter about Safe Schools program sent to parents at two high schools in Sydney It criticises the taxpayer-funded lessons on sex changes and homosexual acts The memo to parents says people wanting a sex change have a mental illness It also slammed how children are forced to role play being a homosexual Several mothers have spoken out on social media in support of the letter Published: 09:10 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 09:21 GMT, 1 February 2017 349 shares
